name: Aptitude Test
description:
In Aptitude test you step into the shoes of a secret agent in the 1960s who's being trained to use the newest spy gadget. Use your intellect and the special bullets to solve the puzzle and prove that you have what it takes to be a secret agent!

Credits:

Programming:

  • Tim van der Geest
  • Alex Verstraten

Graphics:

  • Aafke van der Roon
  • Kayla Roeten
  • Wessel van Montfoort

Music & Sound effects:
